item.title: Why Google Wants You to Be Conversational With Its Updated Maps App
item.description: A Google Maps redesign will leverage Google’s Gemini AI to make the app more like an insightful companion.

item.title: How New-Collar Jobs Are Shrinking the Value of Degrees in Hiring
item.description: Some of the hottest jobs for skilled and experienced workers without college degrees pay more than six figures.

item.title: Experts Worry AI is Driving Layoffs, Even if It’s Not Delivering on its Promises
item.description: If AI proves inefficient, will companies rehire the talent they let go?

item.title: How Much Do I Need To Accommodate Employees’ Religion?
item.description: … and two other tricky workplace dilemmas.

item.title: Mark Cuban Convinced Me to Quit My Job and Start a Company
item.description: More than a decade ago, Mark Cuban uttered a sentence at an Inc. Magazine event that changed the trajectory of my career.
